Title: Revolutionaries must pose as heroes in the face of difficulties -- Quote by Jiao Yulu
Designer: Guo Tingrong (郭廷荣)Sha Gengsi (沙更思)Liu Yongkai (刘永凯)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Mao Zedong quote reads: "In times of hardship, our comrades must look towards results, towards the light, and raise our courage" (我们的同志在困难的时候，要看到成绩，要看到光明，要提高我们的勇气 Womende tongzhi zai kunnande shihou, yao kandao chengji, yao kandao guangming, yao tigao womende yongqi).
